messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tia!!  This is Skyra from hs-ca.  I just joined Unschooling-dotcom a couple of days ago, but after watching/listening for the last 2 days, wonder if I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tia!! This is Skyra from hs-ca. I just joined Unschooling-dotcom a
couple of days ago, but after watching/listening for the last 2 days, wonder
if I really want to be there at all!!!

Is that list always so aggressive/sarcastic/antagonistic??? Or is there
actually some good information shared once and awhile? Perhaps I am just
spoiled with being on hs-ca!!! LOL

I almost wrote a post to U.com but decided that it would probably be
responded to in the same disrespectful manner that seems so prevelant there
at the moment!!

Anyhow, I am only asking because I am trying to decide whether to stay or
unsub. It is such a high volume list, and if it is always so full of
bickering, I can't be bothered!!! I came to hs-ca at the peak of a conflict
as well, and am thrilled to have stayed....I wonder if this would be the
case with this list as well?

(please excuse the choppiness of this...as I am sick as a dog with the flu!!
:( )

Skyra
